About.paragraph_1: Hello, I am Alef, a full stack developer seeking my first professional opportunity. Since the end of 2020, I have been dedicating myself to web development, always balancing respect for established technologies with openness to innovations.
About.paragraph_2: Currently, I am studying Systems Analysis and Development (ADS), and my goal is to apply and expand my skills in a challenging and innovative environment. I am excited to contribute with my passion for technology and my desire to learn in a new project.

Experience.text: I am a Freelancer Developer passionate about technology, always seeking creative and effective solutions for various challenges.
Experience.paragraph_1: Additionally, I have experience in developing APIs and front-end interfaces.
Experience.paragraph_2: Although my previous projects were focused on enhancing my skills, I am eager to apply my knowledge in a professional environment and contribute to innovative and impactful solutions.
Experience.paragraph_3: Currently, I am looking to expand my professional experience in a development team.

al_postel.name: Al Postel
al_postel.about: A project that simulates WhatsApp Web, sending and receiving messages in real time, and saving messages in a collection in the non-relational database MongoDB. The application was created with Node.js in the back end and Next.js in the front end... 2024 - Present.
al_postel.obs: Note: The server is hosted for free on Render, so there may be latency in the login and registration area.

al_postel_api.name: Al Postel API
al_postel_api.about: A RESTful API developed in TypeScript using Express and Socket.IO. This API provides a series of endpoints to manage data and interact with a front-end application, which, in turn, manages a messaging application.

Contact.text: Currently, I am seeking my first professional opportunity in a development team. I believe it is always time to reinvent yourself and learn from mistakes. Feel free to get in touch through my social media. :)
